name: subscribo/support
description: Support package with common shared functionality (Str, Arr, ServiceProvider) extending Laravel classes

suggest.laravel/framework: This package have been developed to work with The Laravel Framework 5.0
suggest.subscribo/localization: If localization-connected functionality in ServiceProvider is used
suggest.illuminate/routing: If routing-connected functionality in ServiceProvider is used
suggest.illuminate/view: If view/template-connected functionality in ServiceProvider is used
